text_blocks.content: From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/31 15:12 Subject: Re: FW: Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm

Hi [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) One more correction - it is generally psychology staff, in connection with medical staff, who determine whether an inmate's suicidal gesture is sincere or done for manipulation purposes.
Thanks, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836-[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665
>>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS" [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/31/2019 3:07 PM >>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) just sent the below correction.

From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov] Sent: Wednesday, July 31, 2019 3:05 PM To: [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) USMS [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usms.doj.gov> Cc: [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Epstein #76318-054 Importance: High
Hi [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Wanted to clarify from our earlier conversation - Epstein does currently have a cellmate. He was placed with inmate Reyes #85993-054. Please let me know if you need more info.

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as [b)(6); (b)(7)(C). The document appears to be an email chain discussing Jeffrey Epstein's status in custody.
